titles.title: Respecting market exclusivity for certain drugs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2980)

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to extend the market exclusivity for a drug which meets the requirements of this Act.
